code: import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductCart(_ref){let{cart,removeFromCart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"cart",className:"page",style:{display:'none '},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Cart - Total: $",cart.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.price*item.quantity,0).toFixed(2)]}),cart.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty - trying adding a product!"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"cartGrid",className:"cart-grid",children:cart.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["Price: $",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromCart(item),children:"Remove From Cart"})]})]},item.id))})]});}export default ProductCart;
